data.description:
FIGHT with any weapon you can find against different enemies in the Hex7 Arenas. 
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031640_1611492052972544_8434024045580790583_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=ydiuN9csKkYQ7kNvgGIh30C&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDnVMUe1RVUygr064SgicrmmMBrLNYooqGcAz3STNeklQ&oe=665ED64C)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game as much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39035393_1502492917145105_2500292279720560247_n.png?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=8nVaI7lwPhwQ7kNvgE4jp24&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAvlrPpVnPhfFZSkE5WhiLSLNUwHVEFR1AQPRYxKh16jA&oe=665F0C9F)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39035339_749541023684513_3682281630778817377_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=m5nBDs2kXucQ7kNvgHrox0s&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYD4NBn_lD9OKNonS43icWhLPRxW6gOVqUqd7BZmLwPiIg&oe=665F0B24)
